description: Java class defining a REST controller for job-related endpoints, providing CRUD operations for job descriptions and handling raw text POST requests.

classes.name: JobController
classes.description: REST controller managing job descriptions with CRUD endpoints and raw text submission.

methods.name: noMongoActive
methods.description: Checks if the 'no-mongo' profile is active to disable persistence.

methods.name: createFromText
methods.description: Creates a new JobDescription from raw text submitted via POST request.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists all job descriptions for the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific job description by its ID for the authenticated user.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specific job description by its ID for the authenticated user.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Updates the full text of an existing job description by its ID.
